00046 void sendBeaconFrame(void)
00047 {
00048     if (NODETYPE != ENDDEVICE)
00049     {
00050         ftBeacon* data_frame = (ftBeacon*)(mac_buffer_tx+1);
00051 
00052         data_frame->fcf   = FCF_BEACON;
00053         data_frame->seq   = macConfig.bsn++;
00054         data_frame->panid = macConfig.panId;
00055         data_frame->addr  = macConfig.shortAddress;
00056 
00057         if(NODETYPE == ROUTER)
00058             data_frame->superFrame = ROUTER_SUPERFRAME;
00059         else
00060             data_frame->superFrame = COORD_SUPERFRAME;
00061 
00062         data_frame->netID = 0x06;
00063         data_frame->hops = macConfig.hopsToCoord;
00064 
00065         // send data to radio.
00066         radioSendData(sizeof(ftBeacon), (u8 *)data_frame);
00067     }
00068 }
